document_name: http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/BLZ/PRODOC- Strengthening legal Aid and Pro bono Services (2).doc

outputs.output_descr: The project addresses the need to enhance legal awareness and support services to underprivileged and marginalized populations of Belize. Through this project citizens in urban populations affected by increased crime and violence and made vulnerable owing to gender, domestic violence, poverty and social exclusions will have improved access to legal advice and services enabling them to understand and assert their legal rights and responsibilities through direct access to professional legal experts within the justice sector and in at least three(3) locations. In order to address the multi-level and multi-sectoral factors that preclude access to justice as a human rights especially for vulnerable populations, the project will be led by the Attorney General's Ministry a key state actor and duty bearer to advance a rights-based approach to access justice and reduce human  insecurity.

project_descr: The project addresses the need to enhance legal awareness and support services to underprivileged and marginalized populations. Urban populations affected by increased crime and violence will have improved access to legal advice.
project_title: Enhanced Access to Legal Aid and Pro Bono Services
